description: AlphaBot provides efficient customer service, smartly escalates complex queries to human agents, and improves with every interaction.
title: AlphaBot | Mixing AI & Human Expertise
introduction: AlphaBot is an always-on business assistant that handles customer requests simultaneously, accurately, and tirelessly. It learns and adapts to new challenges, ensuring future queries are handled with greater expertise. The bot can be updated through easy conversations and is ready to use with a chat link to start answering questions instantly.
targetPeople: Businesses looking for efficient customer support solutions

faqs.question: What makes AlphaBot unique?
faqs.answer: AlphaBot's ability to learn and adapt to new challenges, asking for guidance when needed, gives users control and enhances customer experience.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a 7-day free trial with no credit card required.
